ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, but in my case over half bub per completion... quite a nice surprise. ... From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@rrpc.com] Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, but in my case over half bub per completion... quite a nice surprise.

-----Original Message-----
From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@...]
Sent: Monday, August 02, 1999 2:03 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor


From: "Brett P Gillmore" <bgillmor@...>



Gladly so too. Its about time quests start giving some exp again, also its
around a lvl 25 and up quest so there should be a nice size chunk of exp.
Granted you have to cash out like 278 plat for the gems. (for the star
rubies).
I only completed the gauntlets portion as of yet but hope that the exp gain
is
the same or more for the rest of the items too.

Also anyone wanna sell some good wisdom eq on sol server? Got alot of money
to
burn.
